title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Augmented Reality-Based Professional Competency Enhancement Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and understanding of fundamental concepts in the relevant professional field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: It is possible to explain the educational application principles of AR technology and connect them to real-world professional environments.

Learners will select three core competencies (infection control, patient monitoring, emergency response) in medical/nursing fields using Unity MARS or Unreal Engine, design one educational scenario per competency, and ensure the scenario meets ≥4/5 criteria (content accuracy, interactivity, practicality, user-friendliness, educational effectiveness) with ≥4 points (5-point scale) from expert rubric evaluations, submitting the final output by the course’s end.
Develop and evaluate an AR content prototype implementable in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
